schema.description: The block labels of VPLS are not enough.

schema.description: The number of VPLS VCs reaches the maximum limit.

limit-class.description: Limit type. The value L2VPN_VC_LIMIT_CLASS_VPLS indicates the VPLS VC limit.

max-pw-number.description: Maximum number of VPLS VCs allowed.

schema.description: The number of VPLS VCs is less than 95 percent of the maximum limit.

limit-class.description: Limit type. The value L2VPN_VC_LIMIT_CLASS_VPLS indicates the VPLS VC limit.

max-pw-number.description: Maximum number of VPLS VCs allowed.

schema.description: OAM reported an AIS alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the AIS alarm.
OAM reported an alarm about a client signal failure.
OAM reported an alarm about the removal of the client signal failure.
OAM reported a BDI alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the BDI alarm.
OAM reported an alarm about PW disconnection.
OAM reported the clearing of the dLOC alarm.
OAM reported an Excess alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the Excess alarm.
OAM reported a Fail alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the Fail alarm.
OAM reported an FDI alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the FDI alarm.
OAM reported a LCK alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the LCK alarm.
OAM reported a Lock alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the Lock alarm.
OAM reported an unexpected MEG alarm.
Reported the clearing of the unexpected MEG alarm.
OAM reported an unexpected MEP alarm.
OAM reported an alarm about the clearing of the unexpected MEP alarm.
OAM reported a Mismatch alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the Mismatch alarm.
OAM reported a Mismerge alarm.
OAM reported the clearing of the Mismerge alarm.
OAM reported an alarm about an unexpected CV packet period.
OAM reported an alarm about the rectification of the unexpected CV packet period.
OAM reported an alarm about a remote defect.
OAM reported an alarm about the removal of the remote defect.
The OAM module reported an alarm, indicating that the far-end packet loss ratio exceeded the sd1 threshold.
The OAM module reported an alarm, indicating that the far-end packet loss ratio dropped below the sd1 threshold.
The OAM module reported an alarm, indicating that the far-end packet loss ratio exceeded the sd2 threshold.
The OAM module reported an alarm, indicating that the far-end packet loss ratio dropped below the sd2 threshold.
The OAM module reported an alarm, indicating that the near-end packet loss ratio exceeded the sd2 threshold.
